title: Email Interaction
description: Captures information in the context of an email correspondence between persons

priority.title: Email's priority
priority.description: Captures the priority set by the person who sent the email

sentDateTime.title: Date and time the email was sent
sentDateTime.description: Captures the date and time the email correspondence was sent to an individual or a group of people

receivedDateTime.title: Date and time the email was received
receivedDateTime.description: Captures the date and time when the email was received

body.title: Body of the mail
body.description: The contents of the email after substitution of the placeholders in the template

hasAttachments.title: Email has attachments
hasAttachments.description: A flag represent whether any attachment is part of the email message

isQuarantined.title: quarantine message
isQuarantined.description: A flag to represent whether the email message is a spam

sizeInBytes.title: Email message size
sizeInBytes.description: Record the size of the email message in bytes

failureReasonCode.title: Reason code for failure
failureReasonCode.description: Indicates the error code for not able to deliver the email message

failureReasonMessage.title: Reason Message for failure
failureReasonMessage.description: Indicates the full message for the error code, for not able to deliver the message

fromAddress.title: Person sending the email communication
fromAddress.description: Person who is sender of the email message

toAddress.title: An array of email addresses for the To list
toAddress.description: Person or list of people who are in the To list of the email message

ccAddress.title: An array of email addresses for the cc list
ccAddress.description: Person or list of people who are in the cc list of the email message

bccAddress.title: An array of email addresses for the bcc list
bccAddress.description: Person or list of people who are in the bcc list of the email message

headers.title: Email headers
headers.description: Captures the headers of the email for diagnosis

incomingMessage.title: Inbound or Outbound Message
incomingMessage.description: A flag to represent whether a message was sent or recieved

firstOpenDate.title: First time the email was opened by the receiver
firstOpenDate.description: First date and time when the receiver took the action to open the email

lastOpenDate.title: Last time when the email was opened by the receiver
lastOpenDate.description: Last time the email was opened, by any receiver

isTracked.title: Email Tracking flag
isTracked.description: A flag to capture whether the email was tracked by the sender
